name: Incel Clicker
description: Incel Clicker is fun, casual grinding with raging boomers, miniguns, and all the major Soiree hallmarks, including a rousing soundtrack and plenty of challenge.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: 1 GHz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Monitor capable of a 1280x720 resolution DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 74 MB available space
